short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AZAlert, Amazon Product Research tool that helps you avoid problematic brands on Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claims against Amazon Sellers by brands costs time and money! Avoid these headaches by using AZAlert, the chrome extension that will notify you if a Brand is known to file Trademark Infringement, Cease & Desist, Copyright Infringement or Intellectual Property claims against Amazon Sellers. 

AZAlert works on the Amazon Product pages and notifies if you are on a product whose brand exists is in our database that is known to file claims. You will get a detailed window showing when the last claim was reported as well where the claim came from and how many times it was reported.

Extension will detect brands on the following Amazon Marketplaces: USA, Canada, Mexico, Untied Kingdom, Germany, Spain, Turkey, Italy, France, Netherlands, Australia, Japan, India, China, Brazil, United Arab Emirates

Learn more here by visiting us at : https://asinzen.com/azalert/


☎️ Support Got Question reach us on Live Chat: https://support.asinzen.com
